main_definition: Relating to the physical features, climate, or location of a place on Earth.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Pertaining to geography as a field of study
meanings_and_examples.example: The students were studying various aspects of geographic information systems.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Relating to the physical characteristics of an area
meanings_and_examples.example: His interest in geographic patterns led him to become a cartographer.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Involving or concerning large-scale spatial distributions and relationships
meanings_and_examples.example: The research paper explored the geographic distribution of endangered species across continents.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Indicating something is spread out over a wide area
meanings_and_examples.example: They experienced geographic variations in climate as they traveled from north to south.
